types:type.name: type
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type type = Array<{| ID: Number {"typeId": "int"}, code: String, price: Number {"typeId": "double"}, departureDate: String, origin: String, destination: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, plane: {| "type": String, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"} |}|}> {"example": "[{\\\"ID\\\":1,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"price\\\":400.00,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2016\\/03\\/20\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"MUM\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"HYD\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":150}},{\\\"ID\\\":2,\\\"code\\\":\\\"ER45if\\\",\\\"price\\\":345.99,\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"2016\\/02\\/11\\\",\\\"origin\\\":\\\"MUM\\\",\\\"destination\\\":\\\"CHD\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":52,\\\"plane\\\":{\\\"type\\\":\\\"Boeing 777\\\",\\\"totalSeats\\\":300}}]"}

types:type.name: flight_json
types:type.types:shape:
%dw 2.0
type flight_json = {| airline: String, flightCode: String, fromAirportCode: String, toAirportCode: String, departureDate: String, emptySeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, totalSeats: Number {"typeId": "int"}, price: Number {"typeId": "int"}, planeType: String |} {"example": "{\\\"airline\\\":\\\"United\\\",\\\"flightCode\\\":\\\"ER38sd\\\",\\\"fromAirportCode\\\":\\\"LAX\\\",\\\"toAirportCode\\\":\\\"SFO\\\",\\\"departureDate\\\":\\\"May 21, 2016\\\",\\\"emptySeats\\\":0,\\\"totalSeats\\\":200,\\\"price\\\":199,\\\"planeType\\\":\\\"Boeing 737\\\"}"}
